Title: Image Crop, Resize, Quality, And Upload Control
Description: OWDARO Image Cropper is one of the small components developed and used by OWDARO in their CMS.
HomeWiki:
OWDARO Image Cropper

 

Features:

  1. Crop
  2. Resize
  3. Quality
  4. Maintain Aspect Ratio or Free Selection Cropping
  5. jCrop Plugin
  6. FancyBox Plugin
  7. Upload Control
  8. Show Web image(display images by using the url of images stored somewhere else)
  9. Database Add/Save Feature
  10. Store Images Locally and there references on server
  11. Easy Integration with any Database Table
  12. Assign the ImageID to load the image
  13. Get the ImageID after Upload of new Image
  14. ASP.Net Ajax & Entity Framework Based
  15. Responsive Design
  16. FREE FOR EVER

 

Author: Mohammed Kamran Azam
